participant_1.background:
I would love to learn more about how to help my cats stay cool in hot weather.
I still enjoy my meat but have become a responsible adult.
i fantasize about living in another country.
i draw comics.
i like to work out at the gym to christian electronic dance music.

participant_2.background:
I'm a busy nurse but I love playing basketball on the weekends.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
I collect cycling-related items to remember my father by.
My heart is full of love for my family and friends.
My appearance is important to me, because it reflects my professionalism and my dedication to my job.

content.text: Not much, just got off work. How about you?
I'm doing well, just working on some sketches.
Mostly comics, I like to draw superheroes and sci-fi stuff.
That's really cool! I used to draw a lot when I was younger, but I don't have as much time for it anymore.
I know what you mean, I have to fit it in when I can.
I really like the Sandman series by Neil Gaiman, it's so creative and imaginative.
I've heard good things about that one, I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should, it's one of my favorites.
Thanks for the recommendation, I appreciate it.
No problem, always happy to talk comics.
I'm going to get going, but it was nice talking to you.
You too, have a good night!
